column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I've only been on this medication for two days now... and I feel like I'm floating. Works wonderfully for my cough, tastes TERRIBLE. I can't get over the sensation that I'm floating on a cloud watching everything that's happening around me. All I want to do is curl up with a blanket and go back to sleep for ten years... Hopefully this will pass!

column2: lipstick912@aol.com, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: My doctor put me on the cough syrup and it gave me blurred vision and I was also taken to the hospital because I thought I was having a heart attack. They put me on a heart monitor did EGK, CAT scan of my head, xray. All the doctors in the ER keep asking why I was on this for bronchitis. I had the scare of my life. Just to find out that my heart was fine but had a reaction to the syrup. So if you get blurred vision or fast heart rate stop taking and to the ER.
